alert.note: Alert for Frenchman Basin (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 13 at 3:08AM CDT until October 14 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 210... The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Friday afternoon through Friday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 210. * TIMING...Friday afternoon and evening. * WINDS...Northwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Mid to upper 70s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly and be very difficult to control.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
